name: DeeperFall
description:
Controls:
WASD to move
Space to jump
Shift to Dash downwards
ESC/P to pause

DeeperFall is a nice relaxing game you can zone out with. Designed to be maximum comfy! It has a procedural map with collectibles that boost your score if you touch them. You can Dash the platforms for extra points, but be careful, Falling into the void kills you and restarts the game.

The song is called “chill” by sakura Hz

Created for Ludumdare48 in less than 72 hours by Hengen.
